main event: A UFO sighting was reported in National City, California on May 9, 1952, detailing the observation of a bright oval light moving rapidly across the sky.
interesting points: The object emitted a red trail and had oscillating motion,The object was witnessed for about 10 seconds before disappearing over the horizon,Two witnesses, Mr. and Mrs. William R. McGrew, observed the object at a high rate of speed,The object was reported to be moving horizontally without any sound,Conclusions drawn indicated insufficient data for evaluation of the sighting.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. William R. McGrew observed the object.
